permissions: Admins can update any issue. Non-admins can update issues they reported, and open door team members for the organization can update; changing organization or reported-by requires membership for the previous/new organization as enforced by policy.
side_effects: Updates an open door issue. If status is changed to reported for the first time, creates open door issue reported notifications for the organization's team memberships.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one of --description, --status, --organization, or --reported-by must be provided. --status must be one of: editing, reported, resolved. --organization must be Type|ID format and cannot be empty when provided. --reported-by cannot be empty when provided. Organization type must be Broker, Customer, or Trucker. Reported-by must have a membership with the organization's broker. Organization must be accepting open door issues when newly created or when status is changed to reported.

flags.name: --organization
flags.validation: Type|ID format (e.g. Broker|123); cannot be empty when provided.

flags.name: --reported-by
flags.validation: Cannot be empty when provided; user must have a membership with the organization's broker.
